title: Courgette quiche
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) unbaked pastry case', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '500g courgette, thinly sliced', '175g grated mozzarella cheese', '250g ricotta cheese', '120ml single cream', '3 eggs, lightly beaten', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'paprika']
